formalpara.title: Summary
formalpara.para: You can shrink volumes, as needed, while the cluster is online and available. For example, you might need to remove a brick that has become inaccessible in a distributed volume due to hardware or network failure.

step.para: On the Volumes tab on the navigation pane, select the volume from which you wish to remove bricks.
Click the Bricks tab from the Details pane.
Select the bricks you wish to remove. Click Remove Bricks.
A window opens, prompting to confirm the deletion. Click OK to confirm.

formalpara.title: Result
formalpara.para: The bricks are removed from the volume.
